entry.title: $2585 // RENO**SPACIOUS TWO BEDROOM**PARKING**S/S APPLIANCES** PRIME LOCATION
entry.content:
RENO**SPACIOUS TWO BEDROOM**PARKING**S/S APPLIANCES** PRIME LOCATION

Listing ID #: 169404
Price: $2,585
Property Type: Apartment
Bedrooms: 2.0
Bathrooms: 1.0
Floor: 1

Apartment Amenities

Dishwasher
Hardwood
High Ceilings
Light
Renovated

This is a spacious renovated two bedroom apartment with separate kitchen. It features hardwood floors throughout and high ceilings. The master bedroom fit king size bed with plenty other furniture. Also connected with an extra space you could possible use it as a home office with oversize windows. The second bedroom will fit queen size bed and has two oversize windows. Living room area is spacious, has three oversize windows and one closet in the hallway. The kitchen is equipped with stainless steal appliances gas stove, dishwasher and refrigerator. Also features extra cabinets storage space and granite counter tops. The bathroom is tiled up to the ceiling.

Unit is located on 35th street and 28th Avenue being 4 minutes walking distance to Astoria Blvd or 30th Avenue subway. Restaurants, pharmacy, super market, bars and grocery stores are just one block away. This will not last long!!!!!

Heat and hot water is included in the rent. Laundromat is few steps next to you. Parking available$. Advertising net effective price.

For private viewing contact the Astoria specialist agent, Olga Panteli Sideratou @ 929-320-9228 or email at [email protected]
